<WH559> 'Thus says Yahweh,<WH3068> "You shall not go up,<WH5927> nor fight<WH3898> against your brothers,<WH251> the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478> Everyone<WH376> return<WH7725> to his house;<WH1004> for this thing<WH1697> is<WH1961> of me.<WH8085>"'" So they listened to the word<WH1697> of Yahweh,<WH3068> and returned<WH7725> and went their way,<WH3212> according to the word<WH1697> of Yahweh.<WH3068>
